ygData.subject: Re: Oasis pillar numbers
ygData.msgSnippet: Walbort, There are two pillars on the coast, one and two. the northern one, closest to the North Ro zone, near the pier and opposite the gypsy camp is called
ygData.messageBody:
Walbort,

There are two pillars on the coast, one and two. the northern one,
closest to the North Ro zone, near the pier and opposite the gypsy camp
is called pillar one. The one to the south, most of the way down by the
actual oasis itself and near the inn, that is pillar two. Look out for
the orc camp at the south end of the coast.

Khalabbil

--- Walbort The Cleric <walbort@...> wrote:
> From: Walbort The Cleric <walbort@...>
>
> >Some fool trained an SG onto Pillar1.
>
> Ignorant question: how are the pillars numbered?
> North to south as you
> encounter them along the beach? How many are there?
>
> Walbort, Cleric of Brell Sirilis
>
